game.explanation: All these Python functions provide built-in utility for performing common operations, such as mathematical calculations - pow, max, round and accessing documentation - help
These are all python arithmetic operators that are used for mathematical operations

game.category: Will raise an error in Python
game.explanation: No values are passed into the abs function, MIN is not valid due to capitalization. 7 /  / 3 will raise an error due to the space between slashes. The max(0, 1)/min(0, 1) will raise an error due to division by zero.
If you run these statements in a python command line it will evaluate to 2!
